name: @wessberg/codeanalyzer
description: A service that can analyze your code in great detail ahead of time.

scripts.readme:refresh: npm run changelog:generate && npm run readme:badges
scripts.commit:readme: npm run readme:refresh && git commit -am "Bumped version" --no-verify || true
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:compiled
scripts.build: npm run build:pre && npm run build:umd && npm run build:es2015
scripts.validate: npm run tslint && npm run test
scripts.pretest: npm run clean:compiled && npm run tsc:test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run validate && npm run build
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run commit:readme && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run commit:readme && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run commit:readme && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:next: npm version patch && npm run commit:readme && git push && npm publish --tag next
